::Shadow Wing/ Spears::

Shadow Wing:;
She flew overhead and started dropping the rocks that she was 
carrying onto the heads of the Predacons.  She flew back to the creek 
a few miles away to reload her sachel of rocks.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Spears::
She transformed into beast mode and slung her quills at the Preds, 
aiming at Hades and Anubis.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Koga 
Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis/Ramhorn/Serpentor:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Imprisoner saw something smashing through the trees, right above 
him!  
> Leaping, the crashing tank barely missed his foot.  Getting up, he 
fired off 
> a blast from his sonic blaster at Firearm's left side tank treads, 
rolling 
> out of the way of Brix, watching him fire like a mad man, his back 
now 
> towards Firearm.  
> 
> Predator went to beast mode, firing off a single grenade at the 
area where 
> Firearm's cannon begins to extend from the top half of his tank 
mode.
> 
> Choran pulled out a missile launcher from subspace, a blast from 
Brix sending 
> chunks of tree hitting against his left arm.  Raising his launcher, 
he fired 
> off a rocket at Brix's back.
> 
> =======
> 
> Koga Shuko yelled, a few bullets hitting his scaly side.  Running 
into the 
> Ark, he picked up Ramhorn, using his as a shield, putting a knife 
to his 
> back, where his spark would be if he stabbed forward all the way, 
and put his 
> laser rifle to the back of his head.
> "Back off!  Or we execute him like the Maximal pig he is!"
> 
> Hades raised his missile launcher, a photon charge slamming him 
into the 
> battered hull of the Ark, a metal plate snapping off and falling to 
the 
> ground.  The Newcomer raised his missile launcher, firing a single 
rocket off 
> at Hot Rod's pelvis.
> 
> Anubis ducks, several bullets striking his left arm, leaving cracks 
in his 
> armor.  The Predacon fired off a rocket at Rhinox's chest.
> 
> ---
> 
> Unitron entered the run-down bridge of the Ark.  He took out two 
grenades set 
> too explode on impact, throwing them into the bridge, jumping out, 
the 
> grenades going off.  Unitron then ran for the engine room, laughing.
> 
> ===
> 
> Serpentor yelled, shoulder blasts knocking him back a few feet, 
digging into 
> his left chest.  Raising his plasma rifle, he fired off three shots 
at 
> Striker's abdomen.
